Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Antineoplastic Agent/Antimitotic Agent/Tubulin Binding Agent/Tubulin-Binding Agent SSR97225
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: An antimitotic tubulin-binding agent with potential antineoplastic activity. Tubulin-binding agent SSR97225 binds to tubulin, arresting the cell cycle at the G2/M checkpoint and preventing mitosis.
